Text: This translates to roughly $2.23 million in lost income tax revenue for the state from $46.5 million in lost wages since the strike began at midnight on Monday.
Cause: the strike began at midnight on Monday.
Effect: This translates to roughly $2.23 million in lost income tax revenue for the state from $46.5 million in lost wages
